mapper.insert: insert into mkt_campaign_complete(COMPLETE_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, MKT_ACTIVITY_NBR, ORDER_ID, ORDER_NAME, TACHE_CD, TACHE_VALUE_CD, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, SORT, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK) values (#{completeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mktCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mktActivityNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tacheCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tacheValueCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sort,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select COMPLETE_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, MKT_ACTIVITY_NBR, ORDER_ID, ORDER_NAME, TACHE_CD, TACHE_VALUE_CD, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, SORT, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from mkt_campaign_complete where MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = #{mktCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by SORT asc
mapper.update:
update mkt_campaign_complete set
MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = #{mktCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MKT_ACTIVITY_NBR = #{mktActivityNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_NAME = #{orderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TACHE_CD = #{tacheCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TACHE_VALUE_CD = #{tacheValueCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BEGIN_TIME = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=BIGINT},
STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPLETE_ID = #{completeId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where COMPLETE_ID = #{completeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select COMPLETE_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, MKT_ACTIVITY_NBR, ORDER_ID, ORDER_NAME, TACHE_CD, TACHE_VALUE_CD, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, SORT, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from mkt_campaign_complete where MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = #{mktCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and TACHE_CD = #{tacheCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by SORT asc
